overview: An idol who wasn't confident in himself. "I have to do my best to see everyone's feminine side ..." She belonged to an idol group with a unique personality that broke up in April 2013, and continued to run desperately in search of her whereabouts. "Is it a job to give dreams to men and convey the true beauty of women?" The idol's decision. And a new start. "I also want to be an attractive woman who shines brilliantly ..."
title: Idol Oshikawa Yuri
